name: Woma Badenplatz
description: Delightful spot near the Ostwall run by an elderly German, highly recommended

name: Camperarea Auschwitz
description: Camperarea and parking opposite of the Auschwitz museum. Price is PLN 40 for 24 hours. Showers (PLN 10 per shower) and toilets (PLN 2 per visit). Shower and toilets open between 08:00 and 18:00. Use of internet at the Information office is for free.

name: Camping Ekofarma
description: Small local campsite. Very nice spot! PLN 29 per night (2 persons/no power/showers free). The also serve breakfast here.

name: Camping Ustup
description: Basis but very clean and friendly owner. Price PLN 53 per night (2 persons/no power/free showers). McDonalds with free wifi around the corner.

name: Camperarea Wieliczka
description: Camperarea and parking near Wieliczka saltmine. Price PLN 20 per night. Shower PLN 5 per person.

name: Camping Clepardia
description: PLN 63 (for 2 persons and a car/no power). Wifi is free of charge. Camping also has washing machines. Just outside is a large public swimming pool. Camping has good connections to the city center.

name: Camping Wok
description: PLN 90 (for 2 persons + car/ no power). Very clean toilets and showers (free). Free wifi in the bar. Good connections to the city center.

name: Camping NR. 61
description: Camping on the Elblag canal. Old camping but good spot and great hot showers. PLN 51 per night (2 persons + car / no power / free showers / free wifi)

name: Camping Kaper
description: PLN 57 per night (2 persons + car / no power / free showers / free wifi). Camping is a surfcamping right on the beach. It can be very crowded in high season.

name: Camping Lesny
description:
PLN 70 per night (2 pers/car/no power)

Free WiFi available

name: Camping 24
description: PLN 50 per night (2 pers/car/no power)

name: Camping in Mikolajki
description: The unitedteneristi Paetschman and Pezimann stayed for one Night in Mai 2018. We  fight with millions of Mosjitos. This was terrible. in other Cases the Site ist very well. Nice People and a beautiful look over City ans Lake.

name: Slowinski NP
description:
Entry PLN 6 per person. Electrocar from entrance to the dunes (6km) is PLN 15 per person one way.

Bike rental at Entrance PLN 10 per hour/Bike

name: Wolfsschanze
description:
Former headquarters of Hitler. Entry is PLN 15 per person and parking PLN 10 per car (for this price you can also camp here on the parking with Electricy)

Free WiFi near the Rooms for Sleeping.

name: Parking to Cable Car
description: Driving up there is not allowed as it is a National Park. From here you can walk or take a taxi or carriage.

name: Smok Campground
description: 20 euro per night for 2 in a jeep with a tent on top.

name: U Jawora Camping
description: Quiet grassy spot by the lake. Pleasant place but old facilities

name: Camping 215
description: Nice clean new facilites. Big grassy shady sites but most on a bit of a slope. Pool, laundry, wifi. Close to shopping center and little lake. Some traffic noise since right next to main highway. Good stop for a night.

name: Lakeside near Topola
description: Wild camping on a lakeside. Some Polish also pitch their tent or park their caravan here during summer. Good spot. Fishing.

name: Camper parking from El Camp camper bussines
description: El Camp offers overnight stay for campers on their compound. It is near Krakau (Krakow) and the bus stops in front. 20 min. ride to the city center (5 Zł, you need it in coins!) The place has water and dumping facilities and also elektric for those who need it. They also have Wifi, night watch and provide a timetable of the bus and a map of Krakow. Cost are 30Zł per night.

name: Bielzowice near cementary
description: quiet place for a night. there is water in the cementary.

name: Tramp
description: Forest Campground. Next to the see. between Misdroy and Kolberg. Away from the Ostsee rush. Modern santaries. Full serviced.

name: Pozegowo
description: Just 1km to Mosina where you can find all you need.. You can swim into the lake . quiet place on the week but maybe lot of people on the weekend or holidays. good walking to do in the Wielkopolski park narodowy

name: Lake near Baniewice
description: along a forest road near a cycle path. 300m of the lake. very quiet place

name: parking near a lake
description: a parking near a lake which is quiet (in may at least)

name: baltow parking
description: parking at the city entrance. near jurapark. quiet place

name: Plaża Zamajerz
description: Parking area right at the lake with beautiful view over the lake and the nearby castle.

name: Forest near wide Riverbank
description: 200m into a forest path (4x4 would be good) there are a couple of informal fire place and nice spots to camp. very close to write river bed. good for fly fishing (permit needed).

name: Cheap Riverside Camping
description: Cheap Riverside Campground. Official Place. 6 Zl per Person and 2 Zl for a Car. Go directly to the riverside for the best places. Shower available for 5 Zl.

name: parking
description:
a secure parking place next to the city center. 5min to walk.
easy for a night. nothing special.
restaurants are in the city center. shops as well

name: Camping bumerang
description: A nice little campsite at a farmer's house. Many apple trees. Friendly old man speaking German.

name: Border between russia and poland
description: The main border with 9 lanes. Fast and easy.

name: Lakeside
description:
Picnic place right by the lake with little beach and dock. Many locals in the weekend, during the week, nobody. No facilities but a Dixie. has fire pits as well.

Internet/cell reception very slow to not usable. 1 of 5 bars.

name: Rest area
description: A rest area away from the road in the forest. Would make a nice camp spot, there's a shelter and bin but no toilet.

name: Kaputy Camping
description: Clean area. They rent their big hall to a wedding so it was like trying to sleep at an open air concert. Further there is the airport: one can get no sleep at all.

name: Truck stop, on both sides of the road
description: Great truck stop. Free showers, free parking and clean toilets. ATM mashine at the petrolstation.

name: Nice parking lot in the forest for camping
description: Nice parking lot in Ojcow National Park - lots of spaces, separated by trees making camping more discreet. Picnic tables. There was a portaloo but it was padlocked. We had a car plus rooftent and there was one other RV. Parking is free on weekends, around 5 zloty on weekdays. Restaurant just over the road.

name: Camping Tramp
description:
Small busy site ideal for visiting Torun.
A bit of train and traffic noise but not enough to keep us awake.
We pain 50 Zlotty for 2 adults Land Rover and camping trailer.
Covered area with tables, hot showers and wifi. Electric hook up as standard

name: Agroturistik Camping
description:
An absolute Oasis, beautifully kept and maintained by someone who takes pride in their site. Very friendly owner where nothing is too much trouble. 
Some tree shade and some without. 
Water and electric at most pitches.
Washing machine available. 
Wood and coals supplied foc for fires and BBQ's. 
The owners comes round at night and lights candle lanterns all over the site that gives a wonderful atmosphere.
And all for only €15 per night for 2 people with a Land Rover and camping trailer

name: In the midst of the reed by the lake
description:
Lakeside spot at the pond, which despite being on the opposite side to an adventure park is very (!) quiet. 
Make sure you have bug spray and leave no trace.

name: Pole Biwakowe Nad Zalewem (Over the deluge)
description:
The campsite "Pole Biwakowe Nad Zalewem" is hidden behind a campsite for permanent campers with mobile homes. Use the same entrance and just follow the signs to the reception. The facilities are new and absolutely clean. The site itself is green, with a lovely pond in the middle.
Super friendly, young staff. The bar offers beverages, beer and small meals at great prices.
We stayed there for two days, it was quiet and not very busy. It's perfectly located if you want to visit Auschwitz Memorial, which is approx. 20 km from the campsite.

name: Camp Park Sonata
description:
Green and spacious campsite in the Masuria area, with access to a lake.
Facilities are average, showers at extra costs.
We recommend to try the pierogi at the restaurant on site - they are homemade and delicious.

name: Bialowieza bizon reserve parking
description: Quiet free parking lot next to the bison reserve. Plenty of space and there are some dixies. Good starting point for hikes through the forest

name: Elixir Hotelik Camping
description: Nice place at  a lake. with a small sand beach.

name: Small Exit Next To Cemetery
description: If you need a place to spend one night next to Zakopane, it is an option. Quiet and safe, just next to cemetery.

name: near the forest
description: quiet place near trail to do in the forest

name: In the forest
description: good place to schearch muschrooms in the forest. quiet. pique nique tables and place fort fire

name: Land Serwis, British Garage
description: Large Independent Land Rover Garage with parts shop and mechanics

name: Bunker Parkplatz
description: Big parking area near the bunker behind the harbour. Nice Restaurants

name: Eurocamping
description:
Very nice camping with 42 places. all paces have electricity and water. 
Very clean. 
There is a lake nearby with a walking path around it.

name: Akademie Muzyczna
description: Parking Lot. You must paid 6 PLN    per our. RV can stay here for the night. Near by the City. Only 400 meters. Guarded and fenced.

name: Gravel parking lot in Nieprusewo
description: Gravel parking lot next to the beach. Quiet at night on saturday evening.

name: Parking lot in Kolaki
description: Nice parking lot next to the river in a small village. Some young people in the evening but quiet at night.

name: Camping Echo
description: Small, quiet , lakeside campground. Flat, spacious, well kept and efficiently run. Barbara is very helpful with information and the camp is in a good location. The morning bread delivery is lovely!

name: Off the main road parking
description: Nice little spot off the main road, it has a parking sign, so easy to spot. It has a little resting area with a few wooden bench and a shed with rubbish bins.

name: Caritas camping place
description: Old polish camp side with little old bungalows. Shower and WC are very clean. People are friendly. 50 Zł for one night/car and tent.

name: Camper Park Stogi
description:
Campsite under Trees with Grass-Stone Parking. 
Free WiFi on the whole Camping

2pers/Camper/No Power --> PLN 66.00

name: Forest Glade
description: Nice family-run camping near the lake. The owner, Waldemar, is very friendly. There are clean and hot showers, and you can rent a bike to go to the village.

name: " Oberländer " Canal with Ships over Land and Gras
description:
Ticket Office for Passanger Ships at the " Oberländer "  Canal

4,5hour Tour with a Passanger Ship and Back to Elblag with a Shuttle cost PLN 129.00 pP

Very Cool. Must See !

Description: 

Water Canal with Passanger Ships. But the Canal has 5 different Levels. So all Ships go to a underwater Train Wagon and after go this up to the Hill with Water Power.

name: Mamerki or Mauerwald
description:
Old Bunker's and Head Quarter from the German Army while the Sovjet War. 
Museum and More

Entry PLN 17.00 pP and Parking PLN 5.00
No Camping possible

name: Border between Poland and Russia
description: Smal Border between Poland and Russia. Not much Traffic. Easy and fast

name: Parking spot surrounded by Forest
description: Parking Spot with picknick tables close to the street but surrounded by trees. not visible from the street. nice for a break or  a night.

name: Lake Swierklaniec
description: Super Beautiful Sandbeaches all around the Lake. We drove a small forest road inside and left the car about 20 m away from the beach from there small pathes lead to different beaches. just pick one. its beautiful there. everywhere firepits. but not so much firewood anymore. we left the car in the forest and put a tent at a beach. just a kind of near airport is a little disturbing.

name: Farm camping
description: Great place, next to a Nice lake. Its about 10 euro a night for a van with 2 people, a lot of freedom to make barbecue and fire and the dogs can walk around. Next door a forrest and you can walk all the way to the See.

name: Poland Kaliningrad Border
description: Driving from Kaliningrad to Poland. Easy border

name: Buch camp
description: Nice place in the forest, lot of tracks where you can camp.

name: plaża w Kamieńcu Wrocławskim
description: Small lake just outside Wroclaw city, camping seems to be tolerated. Night was quite although I can imagine it gets busy on weekends as a bbq hub

name: Masurischer See
description: Perfect place at lake, looks like sometimes there are many people. A place to park and access lake for locals.

name: Parking Lot at Wakeboard / Lake
description:
Parking Lot overlooking small lake with wakeboarding facilities and an adjacent artificial beach. Seems to be busy on weekends. 
It was our spot to get quickly into Krakow next day

name: Wyprawa 4 x 4
description:
Land Cruiser and Terrain Tamer service spot, Kylon runs a great workshop here: wyprawa4x4.pl
We got oil service and BFG tire change within 2h

name: Wildcamping at Zalew Sulejowski
description: Long Shore with a lot space for wildcamping. Just follow the Street parallel to the sea and choose one of many forest tracks right to the shore. You can easy camp there right in front of the sea. Have a swim and maybe enjoy a beautiful sunset.

name: Pole Namiotowe Nad Zielonym
description: Really beautiful and cheap campground. You can pay in euro aswell. Many little spots around a clean lake. Water comes out of a spring and you can fill it into bottles.. Have a swim inside of the clear water and enjoy your stay!

name: Augustow lake site
description:
Big flat grassy area next to boat ramp. Some People during the day with or without boats, quiet at night. You can swimm here. 
Short dirt track to get here, no 4WD needed.

name: Campus Domasławice
description: Large Area with many trees. Very nice site. One can rent rooms too.

name: Birkenau rear entrance
description:
Free, flat, clean and very calm little parking area 200m from the rear entrance to Birkenau. There is a “dry” toilet hidden in the bushes of the playground across the street. Another modern toilet block inside the park (first track to the left) 3min walk away. 

Some tips for visiting the Auswitz camps from this location: Birkenau camp is free and you can just walk in but need to respect visiting hours (see attached photo). Free shuttle busses run between Birkenau and Auswitz 1, but first buses FROM Birkenau only start at 10am. Walking from campspot to auswitz1 takes 20min(trough Birkenau). Auswitz 1 is free too, but you need a ticket and there are only a limited amount of tickets dispensed every hour. Come early to avoid (very) long queues. Only tiny backpacks are allowed in auswitz1(see photo), there is a luggage room(4zloty)

name: Polytechnica Sport Complex
description: Grassy campsite with some trees, completely fenced, between railways and main road. You get the key for the gate at the reception, where you can register and pay before (50 PLN all inklusive).Hot and clean showers about 100 m away in the sports building. Mo/Wed/Fri afternoon you can use the swimming hall (1,5 PLN PP). Tram to city center 150 m by foot, one way (4stops) ist 3,2PLN

name: Biwak site
description: Nice picnic site on grass with a wood fire and some shelters where you can stay for a night. Very quite in the forest, only one friendly guy living in a lonely house next to the place.

name: Camping Bolkow
description:
. A lot of shade, which was welcome with over 30 degrees Celsius.
Very friendly people and camping owner

name: Kozienice Recreation and Sports Centre
description: Campground in Kozienice. The place is situated in a nice park near a river. It is possible to rent a bungalow (in high season reservation is needed). Sanitary facilities are clean. Costs for a car, 2 people and one tent are 27 zloty per night. Wifi at the reception.

name: Błędno
description:
Sheds, tables, a bend of the river. Frequent rafting trips and lots of tourists during the season.
---
Szałasy, stoliki, zakole rzeki. W sezonie częste spływy i mnóstwo turystów.

name: Bóbr River
description: Grassy Area for 1-2 Rigs. A river flows nearby and a fireplace is there.

name: Gogolin
description: A public community parking a few minutes away from the highway. Empty and quiet at night. People come to park here in the morning. Use the upper parking lot! A lot less activity there. Toilet building (open 7:30 to 18). Highway can be heard in the distance and there is a train station nearby.

name: Open space in the wood
description: In a dense wood an open space. Very quiet but you have to drive a bit on sand roads, you don’t need a 4X4. At the and of August we heard the deers burling at night, cool!

name: Kurna Chata Zaprasza
description: Kurna Chata Zaprasza. Traditional food. Very good.

name: City Camping Wroclaw (Breslau)
description: Big flat area. Optimal for visiting the old impressive center of Breslau. Tram station directly at the entrance. Take line 9 or 17 to station "Valeria Dominikanska". Buy tickets inside with credit card (contactless).

name: Parking Lot near Auschwitz Entrance
description:
Parking lots near the entrance of Auschwitz.
This Parking area is for free. it is in the beginning of a road with a sign: vehicles over 2,5to are forbidden. other Parking areas will charge you 30 - 40 Pln for the night.
We stay here for one night. nobody bother us. quite at night. Five minutes walk to the entrance.
We visit Auschwitz and Birkenau. we didn't booked the ticket before. we went to the entrance early in the morning (around 7 o'clock) and get a ticket for the day. there is a counter, on the right side of the entrance (white trailer). we didn't join a guided tour.

name: Parking
description:
Parking With toilets. 
30 m off the beach. 
Good for one or two nights.

name: Riverside wildcamp
description: Discrete spot on the Riverside, only a kilometer away from the main road.sheltered against the wind and not visible for others, beautiful place. A little bit noise from the mainroad.

name: camp 9 nature campground
description:
nice campground with a small lake (not for swimming), fireplaces, bikes for rent, between field's and tree's.
with a ample common room and a huge kitchen.
new and clean facilities with hot shower's
look for updated informations at the homepage: www.camp-9.pl
please note: camp opens from 7 am until 9 pm daily ( 1st of may to 30 th of september )
reception open from 9 until 12 am and 2 until 8 pm
Check-in from 4 o'clock pm only!
10 minutes walk to the next supermarket
washing machine available
(4G with Orange)
Tarnowskie Gory is a nice city with some tourist attractions and a shopping centre around.

name: Czartak
description: Small campsite, green, hot water, no Wi Fi.

name: Pilica River Camp
description:
small place behind the dam wall.
it's a gravel area between the forest and the river,

name: Zoo Parking
description:
here is a Parking area free of charge. it is the bus parking area for buses to visit the zoo. we stayed for two nights and nobody brother us. traffic noises of course but ok at night.
in front of the entrance of the zoo is a station for rent bicycles and a Dixi-Toilet.
bus and tram station not far away.
15 - 20 minutes walk to the old town. you can also go by bus (18). 
the alternative quarter of warzaw, praga is not fare from here.

name: Peaceful place
description:
An amazing wild place along a beautiful and quiet lake. 
Access with a van without any problems, but depends on the season. 
4x4 is better. 
You can stay as long as  you want.

name: Binduga Camping
description:
Nice campground on a lake. very quite. new toilets and showers (extra fee). washing machine (extra fee). playground for kids, small bar and shop. pedal boat and rowing boat for rent. electricity and water on the pitches available. disposal point for graywater and waste
we paid 37 PLN for 1 caravan + 2 persons out of the season,
showers 2 - 5 PLN (5 - 12 minutes)
washing machine 7 PLN

name: Suwalki forest
description: Only by 4x4, small trail leads to little sand/grass area. Some noise from highway.

name: Weichsel Camp
description:
flat, grassy area near the river, some anglers around,
nice and quite

name: Malbork Castle Parking Lot
description:
They let you stay in their parking lot over night.
We paid zt. 50 for 24h 
Daytime very busy, but night totally quiet.

name: Motorcycle Mechanic: Stajnia Motocyklowa
description:
Very clean, well equipped Workshop.
I went there to change my chain. I did most of the work using my own and their tools. The mechanic helped me with the difficult parts.

Their coloection of spare parts is rather limited, go to "Larsson" (to be found on Googlemaps) instead.

They are very friendly towards travellers, as they do motorcycle travelling themselves. One of the mechanics speaks english.

name: Forest Parking Gniewkowo
description: Shelters, picnic tables and places for bonfire all around, so might be busier in summer. We had the place all to ourselves in October. Some cars passed in the early morning, maybe fishermen or hunters, but no-one bothered us. Plenty of firewood around. Not far from Toruń, which, if you have the time, has a beautiful gothic old town to stroll around in.

name: campside nearby the river
description: Place with fireplace (sometimes there are firewood prepared), toilet, benches and covered place to sit.

name: Lorf Hostel & Apartments
description: One of the cleanest and nicest hostels I've been of 15 month travelling! Very comfortable beds, blanket and pillow. Hot and really clean showers. Super friendly stuff, no charged luggage storage, tee and coffee included, good kitchen available. We paid 150 zł for two person and three nights in a 10 bed dorm - great price.

name: above the village
description: nice place at the end of a forest road, with the view to village

name: Bivak Place
description: Bivak Place at a lake. A lot of places to stand at the lake.

name: Biwac place at a lake.
description: Biwac place at a lake. Some places to stand.

name: Zajazd Private
description: Beautiful campground run by nice guy. Great place to pitch our tent, many many picnic tabes, and many outlets around. WiFi worked all over the grounds. Bathrooms small but clean. There are also rooms to rent. He has a couple apple trees that we were encouraged to enjoy! Two cyclists with a tent was €8.

name: Bosir Campground
description: Seems to be the only camping in town. 25 zł for two people in our tent. Nice bathrooms with maybe the best showers we have had on our trip. Outdoor wash area for dishes.

name: Stara Kopalnia Parking
description: Parking at the Old Mine Museum. We arrived late afternoon at could stay there overnight. Toilet and small coffee shop during opening hours 8 to 18.

name: Lake Augustow
description: During days a popular picknick area. Primitive shower and toilets available. We payed 37zly per night (2018). Very nice wild spots on sand or grass.

name: Parking Lesny Szeniawa
description: Parking  next to an entrance to Wielkopolski NP. If you come from Poznan don't take the road  zeziorna, there is a bridge with 2.8 m limit.  Take the road to Szreniawa  Dworcowa road.

name: Narew camp
description: Located on Wkra river,  Anmar kayaks. Immediately after the bridge (road 62) at the entrance to  Pomiechowek turn right. Grass by the river.  The place is not active in winter time so you can park.

name: Parking Strykow
description: A parking lot next to the lake, noisy close to the road,  but OK for parking mainly in winter season.

name: A lake on road 123 from Kuznica Zelichowska.
description: A spot next to a lake on unpaved road north to 123 road few km from Kuznica Zelichowska.

name: Lugi picnic  lot
description: A picnic lot in Luigi on the lake nice and quite.

name: Parking
description: We sleep two nights here in car. And another camper drive here to sleep more nights and nobody cares.

name: Parking lot old town Zamosc
description: No fee, Dixi pit toilet. Just 5 minutes walking distance to the townhall and market square. In the town there are no guarded or fenced parking areas!

name: parking lot Kazimierz Dolny
description: Daily parking fee (15 Sloty - 07.00-21.00), the night is without charge. Between a gas station and beside the river Weichsel. Quite at night.

name: parking lot Posen City
description: Guarded and fenced parking area, with a pit toilet, close to the market/rynek

name: Niepruszewo
description: Gravel parking area, lots of green, table, fireplaces, short distance to the lake, quiete at night, no charge

name: Campingspot Kanalu Elblaskiego
description: Camping-spot on the Elblagkanal, where ships travel over land. Pick nick Tables, playground and some gazebos. Some spots for a campfire. There are power outlets, but they are locked. Did not check, if they work. It says, that it is payed parking, but people told me that it is free.

name: Camping U Michala
description:
Little campsite runned by an old lady. Sanitary facilities are old fashioned, but ok.
It’s just a few kilometers from the bison reserve and the National Park.

name: Camping Slawomir Glogowski
description: Little basic campsite right at lake Biale. Nice owners. Two bars/restaurant and a little shop across the street. Many mosquitos in may.

name: Camping Diabla Góra
description: Nice campsite next to San river. Fireplaces, every site has an own covered bench. Good sanitary facilities. Very childfriendly. Also very good price.

name: Zalew Sulejowski
description: Nice and quiet with a great view by the lake. This side of the lake gives you the afternoon sun.

name: łowisko Rokitnica
description: Informal camp site next to small lake used by locals for fishing and wake-boarding. Can be reached via unpaved road. We paid 20 PLN (in june 2019) for a Landcruiser with rooftent. Very basic facilities.

name: Masuren Camping Nr. 173
description: Extremely quiet and green campsite. Run by friendly family. directly by the river. about 40 pitches on grass with some shade. toilets and showers new and very clean. The last 800m of the unpaved road to the campground can be very mudy with rain. a little bit tricky for usual campers. paid about 12 Euro with 2 persons, a camper and a dog incl. electricity.

name: Camping Kalina 178
description: Quiet new campsite and hotel (Build in 2018). Campsite green and many big old trees for shade. Some picnic benches with roof. Outside the campsite, 20 meters from the main gate, many restaurants and tourist shops. looks like Italy in 1975. paid about 20 Euro for a camper with 2 persons and a dog. incl. electricity. price per person 14 Slotty (about 4 Euro). about 5 min. walk to the beach.

name: Camping Na Granicy
description: Small Campsite directly at a big lake. Across the street (opposit to the lake) its about 500m to the beach of the Ostsee. Green Campground with place for about 30 Campers. Some shade from big trees. Toilets and showers are completly new and very clean.

name: cute lake camping
description:
A calm and cute swimming lake. Perfect spot after crossing the border in the middle of the night like us. It is relatively quiet, the road next to it is not loud and in the morning the cars park far away from you if you sleep at the corner under the trees. They give OK shade but at 9:30 you will wake up because of the heat. 

The lake and beach is cute with friendly families coming here, the atmosphere is very relaxed. No annoying youth with music! Water was perfect in June and there are some benches and bushes for shade. 

Very nice place!

name: Free parking next to church
description:
This is the only free parking area near the centre, right next to the church.

You can see where it starts with the P sign (with no words under it) and ends with the P sign with the word 'koniec' under it. 

There were plenty of spaces when we arrived at 16:45 on a weekday.

name: Krys-stan
description: Amazing porcnuckles, maybe the best in Poland. Good service. Fair price. 27pln at the moment. Local place! Highly recommended!

name: Lake side camp
description: Beautiful place to camp next to a giant lake. Blueberries grow in the forest all around and there is a picnic table as well as plenty of space the have a tent or hammock. also parking for big rig just before the lake! The water in the lake is crystal clear with many fish. I stayed here on a Saturday night and had a few people come by to enjoy the lake but I'm sure during the weekdays it would be very quiet.

name: Parking area Moschen
description: Very big parking area for free. We were alone there.

name: Elblag Canal
description: This is the perfect stop for a night right next to the tourist attraction of the overland canal boats.  Interesting to see.  This spot looks like it used to be a camp ground.  We were the only ones here in mid June.

name: Chmielwo - Narew river
description:
Along the river, where it’s wide, a lot of spaces to stay!
Grass for the tents, no mosquitoes, shadow, small sandy access to the river to swim ...  also a lot of fishermen but generally this kind of people don’t make noise! 3G available

name: Widok
description: A beautiful camping with all needed amenities right at the lake.

name: World War 2 Museum
description: Great museum with tours in Polish as well as English. Free entry on Tuesday! audio guides are 5 ZL. definitely worth a visit. I spent 4 hours here and learned quite a bit.

name: Free Camp Michalowo
description: Very nice place for holiday, clean water, toilets, electricity, nice beach and more.

name: Szeroki Ostrów wild camping
description: Beautiful place to spend some time. A lot of spaces for park and spend night in the wild. Really nice view on the Śniardwy lake. Road is bumpy and narrow, but there were some campers.

name: Obrony Museum
description: Super cool museum with a giant bunker to explore. This was the home of one of Hitler's biggest artillery guns that were 406 mm. After a few years a remove to France but the museums definitely worth checking out. 12 ZL entry and there's a few other museums close by for about the same price that also have to do with world war 2. The town of hell is quite touristic... almost like a cleaner smaller version of Daytona Beach Florida haha

name: Gate Poznan ICHOT
description:
great museum showing the history of Poland and her first church. 18 ZL (card or cash) for a guided audio tour of the museum as well as the island just across the river which houses the church as well as a museum. start here and buy your ticket. go through the museum then the rest of the town. I visited for about 5 hours here. learned a lot about Poland and her history. definitely worth a visit. 

even have free WiFi!

name: next to small lake
description: nice small lake, locals come to fish and swim, nobody seems to bother, big rigs should maybe use the parkinglot of the footballfield

name: Cemetery parking
description: Gravel area just off the main highway, but quiet enough for sleep.  Quite a few visitors to the graveyard during the day so dont arrive too early, try after 7pm.  good for 1 night.

name: Lakeside carpark
description: free carpark next to lake.  30 min walk to Old Town. free public beach, free toilets.  very busy during the day but spaces free up at night.  very quiet over night, good sleep.

name: boat lift canals
description:
super cool canals that use mechanical roller a car's to take boats over the high passes.

they have a portal potty in a parking lot which I'm sure you could camp in but definitely worth seeing the boats come out of the canals up on the railway cars

name: carpark
description: carpark allows overnight stays,  maybe free if no attendant on duty, or €5.  No services but close to the church and restaurants.

name: Wolf's lair
description:
In the historical site where Hitler was attacked, there is a camping.
80 zl. for visit and camping one night for 2 person and motorhome.
Quiet under the trees.

name: Kozia Zagroda Ewa Szczęsna
description: A wonderful farm that has goats, lambs, horses, ponies, dogs, bunnies. Locates in the middle of the fields. A possibility to stay in your own car/caravan or in the guest house (which is still under construction), also possible to stay in a room at the main house. A wonderful lady/host of the farm and house with true friendship and kindness. Possible shower and breakfast. Electricity available, running water. parking 10€.

name: Shower
description: In the toilets of the petrol station there is a shower. You pay 7 zloty to the cleaning lady.

name: Bobr River next to small forrest
description: Very good hidden Spot behind a forrest over a small grassy hill. You have to drive next to a field (no road) to get there. Most likely only accessible by motorcycle because of the grassy hill. You will find fire wood. The ground is grassy and soft though a little uneven. The water doesn’t seem too trustworthy but may be drinkable after some cooking.

name: Near the little lake
description:
A nice but small parking, in quiet zone in Varsavia.
20 sz. for the center by Uber.

name: carpark in Hel
description: free on weekends and after 8pm Mon-Fri.  close to town and beach.  1.2km walk to northern beach. room for 4 motorhomes in an area marked for bus parking.  very quiet

name: Beach carpark
description: paved area just off the highway.  short walk across the dunes to the beach.

name: Paradise Dzierno Duze
description: Perfect lake to spend the night at. Several spots in this area. Lot of trash :-( There were many friendly local people here at a saturday night and they also slept here. Perfect located when you drive at the highway. Small track down can be very raugh in rainy days!

name: Camping Barbara
description: Campground at the lake. Nice view. Toilets clean but it stinks a little :-) You have to pay extra for the shower (7zt). 35zt/night (2+van+dog) Look for a white gate in a small street.

name: Wisla Ferry View
description: Several spots next to the river. Friendly fisherman in the morning and  evening. Trash everywhere:-( Water in the river not the best quality...

name: Miejsce Mocy Parking
description: Big parking lot with picnic table and trash bins. Small walk (1km) to a power place. Quiet and clean.

name: Perfect World
description: Amazing place with privat beach. Water temperatur is perfect for swiming. Several spots also in the forest. Maybe nothing for big RV because of the sandy path. We get there with 2WD and had no problem. But drive careful. More spots for 4WD. Enjoy:-)

name: Parking
description:
good place for parking for visiting the old center -10 minutes walking..
70 zloty for 24h.
not so quiet on the night but for only one, why not.

name: Berries forest
description: Nice parking spot close to not main road further deep to forest you’ll find plenty of place for tent or hammock

name: Wild camping at the lake
description: Nice, quiet spot in the forest at the lake. No facilities, two sheltered picnics tables. You can sleep at the jetty or in the tent near the beach.

name: small spot near gas station
description: It is small place but you can sleep here away from others. It is near highway so you can hear some trucks... Otherwise great place

name: Biwak next to river Vistola
description: nice place where you can stay for one or more nights. much space for Tents and cars

name: parking spot with place for tents
description: nice parking spots with many space for Tents and cars. next to the street with much Traffic but it's not very loud

name: Place for tent. NO CARS. just bikes or cycles
description: not accessible for cars but for bikes and cycles.

name: Grassland at Ukrainian border
description: very big glass land with a lot of space for tents and Campers

name: Forest and Fields
description: Nice quiet place between a forest and fields. Close to the main road but not much sound from the street.

name: Meadow on a hill
description:
A flat meadow next to a country road. No access to any services, just a field. There is a spot to park a car next to the road and plenty of space for tents.
Spot is on a top of a small hill so you can enjoy very nice view.

name: Róża Wiatrów, Pustynia Błędowska
description:
A well arranged picnic place at a view point, just at the edge of Błędowska Desert. There is a big parking for cars, picnic benches under a roof and public toilet open all the time. A lot of space for tents. Setting fire is forbidden.
Place is quite popular so some days it might be busy however we were the only one who stayed overnight.
The views during sunset and sunrise were just amazing.

name: Larsson
description:
Well equipped motorcycle parts store.
Don't believe current Google maps marker, they moved half a year ago and the address on Google is wrong.

name: Lake View
description: Lovely choice of spots between a group of lakes.  we're in a 4x4 with a rtt. Sadly no swimming but very quiet at night.  about 20 mins or so to Auschwitz.

name: Camping U Haliny
description: Relaxing campground along the lake with lots of grass, some trees, nice bathrooms, and very good food. 50pln (~11€) for car and 2px. Electricity is 10pln, 8-min hot water shower is 5pln. Meals are 35pln, including salad and dessert. Next door they rent kayak, SUP, and canoes for 10pln/hr. Check out the nearby monastery.

name: Riverside
description: Gravel parking next to a water treatment plant. Nothing fancy but it was quiet and no one came to bother us.

name: Beach river camp
description: Great spot at a quiet beach directly at the river Wisla with an urban view. We enjoyed going for a swim in the morning and the children played in the sand. Good internet.

name: Campground near Lake
description: Beautiful and quite place directly near the lake.

name: Bunker OWB
description: Quiet and very nice place to stay for a night. Startposition for a trip into the bunker.

name: Centrum dialogu
description: For 20 PLN per person per night you have a great campsite near the Auschwitz museum.

name: Beautiful river side camp
description: Only 4km to the highway. Got this advice by a local. Wild camping is allowed. Police passes by for security. You can swim in the river or make a camp fire. Can be crowed at the weekend.

name: GUZ BAR
description: Cheap place to have lunch. For 15zl you get portion of meat, fries and salad. Nice local place with outside terrace. Available parking.

name: Waldgut Lesny Dwor
description: Nice little campground in de garden of a closed restaurant

name: forest camp
description: Campsite in a forest with tables and benches.

name: Camping Tramp
description: In a bend of the river, on the edge of Cisna, a nice grassy large campground with mostly tents. Nice owner speaks a little bit of English. Hot shower 5 zlt, camping pp 15 zlt and car 10 zlt. Access to river and bonfire at night (guitar available). Small shops and restaurants in town, walking distance. Beautiful surroundings.

name: Glinki Lake
description: Campsite at the lakeshore. Entire northern and eastern side of lake is available for camping. The lake is surrounded by nice forest, water is clean and in contradiction to Biale Lake this place is very calm and peaceful. Anyway you'll find a place to leave your car (it's possible to get just to the shore with a vehicle) and set tents. Great place for camping, having barbecue or bonfire and chill out. We've heard rumors there is also a shower available but we've failed to find it :)

name: Community Gardens
description:
Big parking surrounded by community gardens, small stadium and wild meadows. It's 10 minutes of walking away from old town of Zamość and 2 minutes away from city beach at the lake (walk a wild road through the meadows).
There is plenty of space for tents. Toilets and showers are available at city beach.

name: Bug River near Drohiczyn
description: Nice spot for camping next to Bug river, close to Drohiczyn. Place is surrounded by forest. Good for campers, cars and setting tents. You can have a barbecue or bonfire, and bath in the river which is 50m away. The spot is easily accessible with a road from Drohiczyn. There are a lot of other places among river coast.

name: Bondary beach at Siemianowka Lake
description: Big and well equipped free camping site in a village called Bondary at Siemianowka Lake. There is a lot of space for campers, vans or any kind of cars and setting tents. Place is next to a nice sandy beach with a view point at the top of a tower and a lot of equipment like umbrellas or basic gym machines. There are also pit toilets, electricity and hot showers available. You can stay in the middle of the site or a bit away from people in a forest. Place is popular but not busy. Hard to believe it's for free.

name: Camping spot at Biebrza river
description: Great camping spot next to Biebrza river. Beautiful place, clear water, forest and wild nature around. Place was built as a stop for Green Velo cycling route. It's a big meadow next to the river. There is a toilet, showers and a small bar next to it. Easily accessible for any car, close to paved road. You can either set your tent on a grass and leave your car at the parking within your sight or enter a meadow with vehicle. We highly recommend to visit this place.

name: Grzegorz Magdalenowo
description:
Beautifully located, small camping site next to Wigry Lake. Electricity, showers and toilets available, place for bonfire and barbecue, access to the lake. Owners are very helpful and friendly.
You can also rent a kayak here and explore Wigry Lake or Czarna Hańcza River.

name: Close to the City Center
description:
Parking for the nearby lake. We were the only car staying there over night. 
Quiet, no rubbish.

name: Camping Marina Podwierzbie
description: Cute small wellkept campground. Lovely grass, two excellent bathrooms, continuous hot water, covered play/grillroom and small childrens playground. Very enthousiastic young owner, speaks English. We paid 65 pln for two persons and campercar.

name: Gosciniec Jurajski
description: Nice grassy campsite next to small hotel. Open grassy field with one  corner with pine trees for shade. Fire circles around to make fires in which is nice. Large covered area (presumably used by hotel for functions) that is used by campers for shelter and BBQ-ing, would be great for shelter when raining. Really cheap, PLN 52 for one night for 2 adults, 2 kids and 2 tents.  Good facilities, seems nice walks around (others with backpacks on coming back in the evening), however we just overnighted... not busy, only a handful of other campers.

name: Wuthering heights campground
description: Simple campsite with a few level spots on terraces. Clean bathrooms and fully equipped kitchen in the guesthouse. Beautiful countryside. We paid 40 Pln for campercar and 2 people. Owner speaks some English.

name: Camping Family
description: Newly built, beautiful campground. Modern and perfectly clean facilities (kitchen, toilets, showers). Free wifi. You can rent bikes and kayaks for exploring the area such as the Geopark or Muskauer Park which are really close. The owners also speak German and are super friendly! Price: 15 € for 2 Persons including a car and a rooftop tent.

name: Camping #42
description:
The place is perfect for relaxing.  Very silent day and night.
There is always a view of the lake from the vehicle and tent stands. Sanitary buildings are somewhat older, but everything worked (even hot water).
The staff is friendly, some can speak English but if there are no questions they will leave you completely alone.
Pitches are all with electricity and water supply.
No shopping facilities or bar on the site. By bicycle about 3.5km to the city, there sufficient supply. Barbecue and campfire at the lake allowed.
Low cost: 4x4 - 7m camper and 2 persons including electricity is 15€ every day (Sept. 2019).
The campground is good for 10 tons plus...
PS: no coins for the showers - showers as long as you want....

name: forest car parking
description:
parkig near main road to Biała Podlaska. By night very quiet.
has a fireplace.

name: Białowieża park
description: Parking in The middle of Białowieża city, near a huge park. 10zl per day, parking is not closed at night.

name: Parking next to park in town
description: Next to a big park. Quiet. Very light traffic in the morning. Under big trees, very shady. OK for several big rigs together. A police car passed by in the evening they did not say anything. Locals with dogs passed by. Weak WiFi connection eventhough it is in town. Interesting not to have to drive too far from the highway when you travel through Europe within a few days.

name: let'srelax
description:
old but quiet place, room and shared bath/ tub/, spacious dining room just like home. 
120 Pln with breakfast. 
Owner is friendly but speak little English. 
downside# wifi is weak in room and restaurant close at night.

name: Riverside
description: Beautiful place on lawn next to the river Vistula. A lot of flat space for any kind of vehicle. During day on a weekend some people around (walkers, fishermen,...). Completely quiet at night. Could be busy in high season. 4G with orange. 4x4 not necessary.

name: Drinking water
description: Here you can get drinking water to fill your tanks.

name: Free official camping
description: It is a parking lot next to a park but it is explicitly allowed to camp here. They even have three electricity points (230V) and there are toilets and showers (only available during opening hours of cafe). Also bins available. Everything is for free! On a sunny Sunday afternoon it was really busy but all people left late afternoon. Completely quite at night. There is also a small playground for children.

name: Good for a night
description: in the church parking lot just behind the church.  something like this is protected from street noise.  good for a night.

name: Free Water
description: Free Water good quality. .At the bottom of the cemetery parking.  easily accessible

name: Field camp close to Przemyśl
description: Leveled places in the meadows near a dirt track at the San River. Very close to the city of Przemyśl, not to far from the main road. But the place is out of sight from any houses and quiet. Decent alternative to all the TIR parkings closer to the border.

name: Fishing pond
description: Fishing pond with plenty of space for camping and overlanders. A mobile toilet was available October 2019. Close to the motorway which you can hear.

name: Parking lot
description: Parking lot with pit toilets. Ideal for hiking or mountain biking trips.

name: Riverside camp
description: Several spots at the riverside. The position marks the most private spot but there are several spots closer to the road. Big rigs and campers can park close to the road whereas smaller vehicles can find more private spots. We did a day of hiking in Tatra from here. In accordance with other apps the area is busy in sommertime. Also there is surprisingly much traffic on the bad gravel road leading to the village.

name: WW2 machine-gun bunkers
description:
The Lidzbark triangle hike starts at this parking lot. If interested in military history it is an excellent 1h hike.
Very quiet and peaceful place in the forest, also lots of old logging roads in the area where you probably can park.

name: Water tap
description: Water tap in street. Free water and a lot of space for big car.

name: Camp by a lake
description: A free campsite just next to a lake. Seems to be very popular, but there is also lots of space here. Very quiet. The gravelroad in can easily be missed, especially when dark outside.

name: On Zalew Zemborzycki
description: A place by the lake. On weekends a lot of people, but quiet at night. You can burn fire. Large vehicles can stay in the parking lot, it is at the entrance. Parking payable in the summer season € 2 per day. Near toitoi at the last bus stop. There are no other extras.

name: Lublin Old Town
description: A large parking lot next to the castle in Lublin. The best place to explore the old city. You can stay overnight if you don't mind street noise. Near the market, a large gallery and many other attractions. 200 m from the place is a public toilet, for a fee you can pour sewage and pour drinking water.

name: gas bottling plant
description: A place authorized to fill bottle in Poland.  You can legally fill the gas into the bottle.  Open from 8 to 18.

name: Legato Motocykle Warszawa
description:
Motorcycle shop
Clothes, helmets, boots, accesories, parts etc
Free WiFi
Tea, Coffee

name: Local park with great views
description: After pavement ends, continue down the road, it will be on your right. There is a large sign with map/info.  Covered picnic tables and great views from top of the hill. Not an official campground but local caretaker said it was ok to set up tent. Campfires are ok.

name: the forgotten lido
description: old, public lido direct at the lake. overall a nice and quiet spot with a smal beach and jetty, water tap and public toilet (not clean) available ! #mannitalks

name: Little track along the road
description:
Small track off the road on our way to Katowice. It’s a dirt road that is probably a work road for the forest plantations.

Safe and far away off to not be seen by the main road!

name: in the woods
description: a small resting spot in the wood with tables and seats close to a small lake. you need to follow the old and myterious stairs down to the lake and stop at the smal platform to enjoy the great view. #mannitalks

name: headland
description: small and beautiful campground direct at the lake with a small private beach. shower, shop and restaurant accross the street. #mannitalks

name: lisi ogon
description:
On the lake shore a place for a bonfire.

Nad brzegiem jeziora miejsce na ognisko.

name: A&O hostel
description:
this is the second time that I've stayed at this hostel while passing through Stuttgart Germany.

It's the cheapest hostel that you're going to find at €8 a night. They will end up charging you for sheets, towels, coffee and anything extra but you can't really beat the price.

There is not secure parking but I've had no issue leaving my motorcycle out front, locked to the fence.

name: beautiful spot on the tatra mountains
description: Top place with view on the Tatra Mountains

name: Bandzior4x4
description: Very good mechanic - all types of cars. Especially Patrols, Toyotas, Land Rovers. You can menage all problems thanks to Robert experience. Fast diagnostic and help.

name: Orlen_Fuel_Sta
description: Reliable fuel station, all needed kind of fuel are ready to get. Services are on place and personel is customer friendly.

name: Camping Lasówka
description: Nice place for camping in mountains, near to forest and ski area

name: Willa Zameczek
description: Nice hotel with parking in the center of beautiful spa city. Near is a lot of attraction.

name: Drapacz Karwica
description: Formal commercial camping by the Nidzickie Lake. Now it's wild and free but you can find one "TOI TOI" toilet. Camping place is hidden in the forrest and there is no offical directional signs. You have to navigate on GPS. From main road there is about 9km on gravel.

name: Camping w Dolinie Chochołowskiej
description:
Nice place for small and big campers just few steps from the main gate of Chocholowska Valley;
Electricity, water, dump point, TV coverage, bikes rental -you will find here

name: Camping „Wyzwanie” - kemping nad Wdą
description: Very friendly owner, beautiful, large space close to the small river Wda, between forests. Fireplaces, water, electricity, WC, showers - just everything what You need; owner speaks German; 100% nature. I recommend this place.

name: Peace Church
description:
Superb wooden church. Exceptional interior decorations. 7 slotis the entrance.

Superbe église tout en bois. décorations intérieures exceptionnelles. 7slotis l'entrée.

name: air de jeux pour enfants
description:
children's playground where you can park and sleep. small picnic kiosk

air de jeux pour enfants où on peut de stationner et y dormir. petit kiosque pour le picnic

name: parking
description:
shaded parking in the city center. ideal for visiting the city
---
parking ombragé en centre ville. idéal pour visiter la ville

name: Parking near lake
description:
Parking near a lake where it is possible to swim. Public toilets. Lots of people as soon as it is hot.

parking près d'un lac où il est possible de se baigner. toilettes publiques. beaucoup de monde dès qu'il fait chaud.

name: Parking by the sea
description:
Parking by the sea. Fish for sale right next door. Over night possible.
--
parking en bord de mer. vente de poisson juste à côté. nuit possible.

name: parking
description:
Ideal parking for visiting the dunes. Bring a bike or take the electric buses

FRANCAIS
parking idéal pour aller visiter les dunes. prévoir un vélo ou prendre les bus électriques

name: PARKING Polanka Redłowska
description: large parking lot along the coast.  Direct access to the beach.  possibility of staying overnight.

name: Harbour Office
description: Parking right next to the harbor Admin office.  water, shower, electricity, wc available.  Get permission from harbor office.  5 min walk from the city center.

name: Parking Ground
description: I was standing there on the parking ground for busses for 4 nights. nobody was comming, a nice place directly by a large park

name: parking in the park
description: you can park along the road in the Park. it is calm and you can stay the night

name: Parking Ground
description: A long parking ground for lots of cars, I was staying there for 5 nights.

name: Water
description: Water at the entry of the cemetery. No problems to fill the tank.

name: parking next to the lake
description: Parking next to the lake. Far from the center of the city. Calm during the night.

name: potable water
description: potable water tape next to the road. no problems to fill the tank

name: Leg-pole namiopole Campground
description: we checked out 3 campsites around the lake and this is by far the nicest. just choose a spot in the back away from all other people and you are all by yourself. very cheap and toilets are clean. you are just by the river and they also have some hotdogs, chips, beer and a small store whre you get the basics. trees provide some privacy

name: parking in the forest
description: cool parking in the forest. next to the memorial of the crab train of Frank Hans, Nazi condamed in Nuremberg

name: mine of salt
description: beautiful mine of salt of wielicczka. church, sculpture, .... very nice

name: parking free for the mine of salt
description: free parking for the mine of salt. 5min to walk to the entry of the mine

name: Bukowiek National Park
description: Nice and quiet nice trees to have plenty shade

name: Wild Camping near Szczecin
description:
Forest park at the left side of highway 10 heading north.
Several nice and quiet spot to sleep.

name: Nearby Opatowiec in front of the ferry
description: Free parking ground at the the river wisla nearby the village opatowiec.

name: Beachcamping at Jeziorsko Lake
description: Lots of shady spots to park right next to the lake. Sandy Beach and Crystal clear water. Spent one night and a beautiful summer day here. Got busy at noon, locals with there families. Night was quiet.

name: Camping Pielaka
description:
Campingsite nearby Kazimierz Dolny,
About 1 km zu the City, 50 meters to the river weichsel.

name: Camp Bursztynowy Las
description:
Camp Bursztynowy Las offers 30 camper spots, as well as accomodation in galmping-style safari tents and cabins and en suite bungalows. It is perfectly located in the middle of a pine forest, 5 minutes walk from a clean, wide, sandy beach and only 20 minutes to the city center by taxi. In the season water tram can bring you to the center through the Gdansk back waters - excellent trip. 
Camper spots are wide, with electricity connection and offer a lot of privacy. The place is very peaceful and quiet.

name: Noclegi
description:
Nice hostel with very friendly people. 
No camping possible. But rooms with shared kitchen. 
Good WiFi connection and space to hang out. 

Speak some english and some german. 

ATM and supermarkets are close by

name: River bend beach
description: Nice place directly at the river beach, deep enough for swimming. Space for 5-10 cars. Road of stones. Bigger trucks may have a problem to approach directly to the beach. But there is enough space to turn around.

name: Marszowice - stone beach
description: Nice place, close to the village, directly at the river. Only stones, and not the small ones :-) Big trucks will probably not be able to reach it.

name: Zator cementery
description: Cementery is always good place where to find the water...

name: Goczałkowickie Lake
description: On the north west end of the barrier lake just off the main road 939. Dirt road (sandy, muddy when wet) with a few branches in the way leads to a small covered lot. A few yards further you have access to the lake for a swim.

name: Wild Camping in the forest
description:
Many good spots to camp and sleep.
Shadow and silent.
Don't leave garbage like others did.
Have a good sleeping night and enjoy nature.
No facilities but good and free.

name: Camping by the Bug River
description:
Good place just beside the Bug River.
Some spots with acces to the water.
400 m from the bridge.
You can choose both sides of the river to camp and sleep.
One is a little more close to the city and some people come by.
The other is more quiet.
No other facilities.
Keep the place clean.

name: Parking And Sleeping near the Dam
description:
Big public area used by locals to park and walk to the dam and castle.
These are located 500m from here.
Nice grassy area with some paved unused spot to park and pass the night.
We came here around 8 PM made our meal and opened our rooftent.
Very quiet. Some mosquitos bu nothing bad.
There are 2 trees that give you some shadow.

name: Radocza river place
description: Place just at the river Skawa. Be prepared with the insect spray. Locals are friendly.

name: Wspolna Cementery
description: Cementery, space for 5 cars. Water is directly at the entrance

name: Rybaki camp spot
description:
Campground made by the Rezerwat przyrody Szczyt Wiecza (forrest reservation). 
3 covered sittings and lot of tables. It is allowed  to stay 24 hrs with the camper. Tents are not allowed

name: Sleeping place by forrest
description: sunny place on meadow. Up the Hill. free camping.

name: Tuchlino cementery
description: Cementery. Water is just on the right side of the gate

name: Good place to sleep near Auschwitz
description:
2 small spots to pass the night.
In front of some little ware houses.
Quiet and the locals were very gentle. 
Good for one night. Please keep the paved and around places clean.

name: Lake view
description: Beautifull spot at a lake. It is only 1 km from the mainroad. The dirtroad is okay, you don’t need 4x4. You can picknick, swim and even catch a fish if you like. We were here on Friday and stayed overnight.

name: Agroturystyka Ukta 19
description: We wanted to make a kayaktrekking for several days on the beautifull Krutynia river with connecting lakes. We went to Agroturystyca Ukta 19. We were very happy with the service. We payed 220PLN for 3 days Kayaking inclusief everything. This means rental and equipment for 2 person Kayak, transport back and forward, save parking for camper during the trip. We were allowed to stay overnight so we could start next day early morning. Upon return of our trekking we stayed again overnight. Camping with tent or book a room is also possible. Ask for Mattheus(Matthew) as the owner Andrew does not speak English.

name: Wieza Widokowa
description: Parking spot were we stayed overnight. It is near a viewing point. Unfortunately we didn’t see the bisons.

name: Topaz camp
description: Nice camp 50 meters from the beach. 34 zl for 2 persons and car with rtt. Showers 1 zl / 1 min. Toilets are always clean.

name: Mokronos
description: Large camping spot from the forest reservation

name: Kisalaga
description: great place near the lake, very nice quiet and peaceful ,close to the A4 motorway exit, three kilometers to the town where you can recharge all kinds of gas cylinders and you can do shopping.

name: Kikity Camping
description: Campervan friendly, cozy place with fireplace, access to water, kayaking and fishing. Max 10-15 cars, the owner speaks English. Quiet and relaxing spot at the lake coast, away from touristic routes.

name: Linat Orchim guest house
description: All you need for a night or two. 220 Zloti for two nights. Very central. Internet could be faster.

name: Meadow at the clean river
description:
Small (~2km2) peaceful meadow full of grass (no dust) at clean Wkra river with nice place to swim. Full of sun. Few fireplaces. 
Entry by small road, big camper can have some difficulty to drive in. 

No charge. 

A little bit of garbage around. 
No fisherman.

name: Imperiale Hotel
description:
Very large and secured parking lot owned and managed by the Imperiale Hotel (300 m from Auschwitz Museum entrance).
We could spend the night and use the toilets of the lobby.

name: Lakeside
description:
Small meadow at very clean lake. Grass, shadow, swimming place. 

Some local people come here to swim.

name: Beach at Zukow
description:
Beach, swimming place, kid’s playground, tables, some shade, parking. 

Nice place but crowded during days and evenings by locals.

name: At the river
description: Nice place next to the river with the beach.

name: Old oaks
description: Nice place with the fire place. Will fit big rigs as well.

name: Camping 140 | OSiR Suchedniów
description:
Great place to camp. Wifi all over the place, a lake, nice and clean.
Motorbike, one person and one tent makes 25 Zloti. You can get electricity in the kitchen. Not sure, if there's electricity at all spots.

name: Wild Nature Place
description: Beautifull site in the forest. Little fire place and a bench. It is a private place and somebody told is that camping is not a problem when you stay close to the path. So don’t drive to deep into the grassland. You don’t need 4x.

name: Płażówka parking with Tatry view
description: Small parking at small wooden church. Few houses around, but view to mountains is nice.

name: Gory Stalowe NP
description: Mixed parking in the NP. We stayed here for the night. Very quiet. Only some cars during the day. Good place to start hiking.

name: Along the edge of Wiory reservoir
description: The Wiory reservoir makes for a quiet place amidst hills of farmland, protected by a row of hedges and trees. This spot on the edge of the water is accessible by 4x4 trail, not too difficult when dry. The spot has a few fire pits and could house up to five 4x4s on flat pitches. When we were there the place was empty. The reservoir is good for swimming, though there aren't real beaches around (marsh-like). We suspect this is not private property, but owned by the reservoir. All of the few passers-by were very friendly.

name: Zalew Książ
description: Parking spot on the bank of Pool for some 10 vans.

name: 86 Gear Motorcycle shop
description: small motorcycle shop with a very knowledgeable mechanic. oil changes, suspension work, restoration, welding, modifications, troubleshooting, electric work. has access to many motorcycle parts for all year bikes

name: Wild camping in the forest
description: A nice spot in the forest close to Łódź and very close to the highway.

name: Wild spot near Warta River
description: Great open spaces. Not many people, some fishermen. Quiet and close to the nature. Few spots with fire pits. No toilets. Good service.

name: Warzawa Camping
description: Nice camp near the city . Gated grassy place. A bit old but OK for visiting the city. Very friendly owners.

name: Goniadz Camping
description: Very nice camping place. Friendly owner. Clean  with bathrooms and kitchen. Directly on the river so the canoe Traveller can stop for a night. Popular place for bird watching. Also you can rent a Cani

name: Public camping and picnic area, free.
description: Public camping and picnic area, free.  With fireplace and covered seating area.  Well attended during the day, quiet at night, except for the deer roaring during the rut.  4G.

name: ATM Bank BPS without comission!
description:
ATM Bank BPS without comission!
ATM Bank BPS without comission!

name: Quiet place on a mown meadow.
description:
Quiet place on a mown meadow.  Wonderful sunset, friendly farmers.  
4G.
The whole region is limited with 5 tons!

name: Sowno riverside
description: Quit spot in an open aera in the woods near to a river. Plenty of places to stay.

name: Parking z wiatami "Borowiackie Szlaki"
description: A site just beside the road, no lights or power, a few benches and a toi-toi. Good for overnight sleep on journey

name: Behind the birch groves
description:
A hidden place behind the birch groves.  Absolutely calm.  
If you drive further west along the dirt road, there are still plenty of parking spaces.  4G

name: Bolesławiec Forest Parking
description:
Small site good for rest or sleep next to the road. Pretty quiet at night. Plenty of space, even for an RV.
There's a wooden bower perfect for meal eating. Everything is surrounded by net, so no wild animals should bother anyone.
Nearest gas station (24/7) - 6,5km South
Shops around 3km South and North

Regulations board says that:
- RV's cannot park there for more than 24 hours
- No tents

name: Camp at the Goldap lake with bright view!
description:
Camp at the Goldap lake with bright view!
Quiet place out of season, but I don't know how it is in high season.
H+

name: Kwatera Himmlera Hochwald
description:
Himmler SS Field command bunker.
Still existing!

name: Campspace by a lake
description: Space for camping on grass by a lake with beaches.

name: An uncultivated meadow under apple trees.
description:
An uncultivated meadow under apple trees.  
Magnificent view, total peace at night.  Friendly farmers who even speak a little German.  4G

name: free drinking water.
description:
free drinking water at the camper parking.
3/4" thread, good pressure!

name: Jezioro Mietkowskie
description:
On the shore of huge lake. Many places Some friendly fisherman. Beautiful view.

Small hill on access road (gravelled). Leave room for fishermen to access water.

name: Restaurant Starowka
description:
Exzellent and fresh food, reasonable prices.
Free WiFi.

name: Wild Camp at the channel with the ship's on the hill.
description: Quiet place during the night, with the ship uphill going throughout the day. sometimes 4G.

name: The Folk Building Museum - ethnographic park in Olsztynek (Hohenstein)
description:
Open air museum of the construction of the people. 
Absolutely worth seeing, with great attention to detail. 
You should take a few hours to do it!

name: Polenmarket
description: Free camping next to the polish market along the river. Water, toilets, electric hookups, restaurants and of course the polish market where you can buy groceries and misc at prices that are cheap if you're coming from Germany but expensive from Poland.

name: Petrol Station
description:
drinking water at Petrol Station, free, on the backside of the house.
1/2" thread, good pressure.

name: Chron Lasy
description: Nice forest camp on the lake. Beautifull place. Simple organised but everything available wath is needed.

name: Western Camp
description: Allowed us to park in the parking lot for PLN100 overnight. There was a restaurant here but we did not use it. Available reception toilets from 7am. Gated parking lot.

name: ECC Land Rover Service
description: One of the best Land Rover repair company in Warsaw. 25+ years in business. Huge experience with Defenders, Discos and RRCs. They also work with current LR models. Owner is an overlander too. Great access to spare parts (they also have some in stock). English spoken.

name: Camping Pomona
description: the camp is very clean, nice, friendly staff, clean showers, good cuisine and restaurants, near the lighthouse, quiet place to stay

name: Parking lot
description: This is a good size parking lot across the school and near a church. It's mostly used by school staff during work hours. It works well as a place to spend a night, but there not many attractions around. Good little store and a bakery just 100m down the street. More stores across the highway. About 45 min from Krakow.

name: bp station
description: Large petrol station with really good and clean amenities. Toilets are free, shower is 8zł. Easy to park overnight for large vehicles. Veggie options in their cafe.

name: Shell
description: Gas station with lot of places to sleep in camper or car.

name: Parking near ZOO and aquapark
description: Parking is located around trees and stay quiet during all night. There are no water or toilet but there is a gas station near parking.

name: Borowy Las
description: Beautiful secluded location. Site by a small picturesque lake. Space for several tents at the pier, place for a campfire. Offroad access. Next to three summer houses. Good for adventure motorbikes

name: Camping Stolowogorski
description:
Fantastic place. Everything You need to reset a camper. Dump station, water, gray water dump. Also everything for your comfort, showers toilets kitchen and washing machine, basically all you need .

Price 2021
12 PLN person
10 PLN van
20 PLN camper
10 PLN washing machine
Animals free

name: Wiata turystyczna - national forest right next to the beach
description: Unserviced small campground with little shelter roof. We came with a big rig and stayed 500m away in the forest parking. Some fisherman and to other campers on a sunday in may. Might be quite busy at high season. Beach is 50mtrs and beautiful! Very few people when we were here.

name: Camping zum Teich
description: Beautiful campground next to a lake. Big fire place, warm water showers and even a sauna. The campsites are not very big but surrounded by trees so you get enough shade and a bit privacy. We paid 18€ per night for 2pax and a camper. Would recommend!

name: Slupsk
description: Wide parking lot in Slupsk. Close to the road but quiet at night. No restrictions. Overnight parking possible.

name: Parking with playground
description:
Quiet parking place in a very small town with garbage bins and a picnic bench also with a little playground for the children.
Next to bike-rental store who opens on Tuesday at 8 o'clock in the morning
NO toilets on site

name: Gababout campsite
description:
Excellent campground with all the facilities you need. Pitches are large and have a picnic table. There is a large fire put for bonfire, washing machine (use included in price). About 20,- per night for two people all-inn. 

And good/excellent cycling paths to the city of Wroclaw.

name: MOLO resort
description:
MOLO resort is everything you need. camping,hotel,restaurant,activiti-center,swimming pool.

we stayed on the camping for 3 days and paid 258PLN (56€) for 2persons, a car and a tent.
the sanitair is in very good condition, electicity is included, there is a playground for children.
the only minor is: on very rainy days, the water doesn't flow away easy
very fast service at the restaurant 👌 

more info and prices: https://moloresort.pl/

name: Next to the river
description:
A nice place before the bridge into the city. There is a party set up, but it is just open on the weekends. I ask a security man. He said it is OK to stay over night. I feel save.
It is 5 min walk to the mall and 10 min to the city center

name: Pole Namiotone 179
description:
Simple campsite with electricity, toilets and hot showers. Dogs allowed. Unfortunately no washing machine. Pitches in the pine forest, very hilly ground. Approx. 100 m from the Baltic Sea.


Einfacher Campingplatz mit Strom, Toiletten und warme Dusche. Hunde erlaubt. Leider keine Waschmaschine. Stellplätze im Kiefernwald, sehr hügeliger Boden. Ca. 100 m von der Ostsee entfernt.

name: Campground
description:
It is a nice Campground by the lake.
They carged me 25 Sloty for a big rig and 11 Sloty for one Person. Incl. Tsx it added up to 39 Sloty.
They offer Electricity, Toilet and Shower, with i didnt used. 
It was nice and quite.

name: Polana Rogoźniczańska
description:
kind of wild camping, but you pay 30PLN for 1 person/night, there is basic sanitair and room for making fire, you can use one of there tents or set up your own on the platform, cars are not allowed with the tents, only to unload your gear 

we had a great night with 4 different nationalities (BE,NL,D,Pl)  that came togheter by the fire.

name: Rzesnov
description: Petrol station where you can stay the night. Some trucks park here. Just enough away from the road and next to a central garage for the local busses.

name: Leszno Airport
description: Camp is located at airport. Fenced and fully equipped. Very nice place and coordinator. Places for campers, cars and tents. There are trees, so provides shade. Buildings are quite old, but everything works perfectly.

name: Las Bagnas - campgorund
description:
A huge private spot with everything you need. Showers, WC, a small pond with fish, electricity and kitchen. Barbecue and fire possible. 
Great and super friendly owners, moto-lovers. Thay have a motorcycle shop as well if U need some stuff for bike. We paid less than 9$ for a tent next to the quiet forest. Amazing place, animals friendly. Turn when you see a sign "Las Bagnas".

name: Las Bagnas ROOMS
description:
Private rooms with everything you need. Super friendly owners, bikers. 
Cost about 30-55 $ - depends which season. 
Cool spot close to the forest

name: Skleb sezonovy
description: Camping place next to a bar. 30 Zloty for a camper and 5 Zloty per Person. Toilets and electricity available. Accessible by dirt road.

name: Lok Marina Camping
description:
Central Camping close to town.
They charge 99 Sloty per night.
Be careful with a big rig. If you come from town, there is a height restriction 2,50 m.
With a big rig you need to cross the river at the main road, from there it is accessible.

name: Lakeside
description: Place for a night. It's silent but not so far from the highway.

name: Tawerna Szymonka
description:
Lovely place to stay - next to a small harbor. Facilities, fresh water, electricity, everything there. Very clean! In the Tawerna you can have some good food and drinks. Be prepared to sing with the owner and his guitar. 
Most people arrive by sailboat. We were the only one on the camping ground (5 places). Also good for tents. 
Possibility to sit at the harbor and watch small sailing boots arrive. 
45PLN for 1 car with roof tent, 5PLN for shower. 
Open only during SUMMER!

name: Above the lake
description:
Lovely spot - view over the lake, perfect for watching sunrise and sunset. BUT: millions of Moskitos!!!
Sandy ground, off-road path to come here. Great. But you can hear the street. Some locals come here for fishing. And you can’t get away from the Moskitos. We spend the evening early in the tent, because we were no longer able to take it. Spend the night in August there.

name: Winnice Kojder
description:
Vineyard with great wines! Brother and sister build up this vineyard, ecological wines - great taste. 
We asked if we could stay and had the look to stay 2 nights between the grapes! We good a wine tasting and decided to buy some of their whites wines - and enjoyed them there and on our journey. 
Lost place in the middle of nowhere. 
Please ask / contact Artur before you go there - it‘s a private property.

name: parting lesny przy stawie
description: small place, beside the main road with tables to eat and spot to park/sleep, you have a lake that you even can make some fishing

name: Camping Majawa 123
description:
Simple campsite / pitch in the middle of the city, Warsaw.
Easy access to bus and tram to the city centre.
Quite expensive: 2 adults + 2 children with off-road vehicle and roof tent 175 zl per day.
.....
Einfacher Campingplatz / Stellplatz mitten in der Stadt, Warschau.
Gute Anbindung zu Bus und Tram zum Stadtzentrum.
Platz Recht teuer 2 Erwachsene + 2 Kinder mit Geländewagen und Dachzelt  175 zl pro Tag.

name: Parking in woods
description: parking in woods near road. quiet and clean place. there is running water and toilet. plenty of cars in daytime, but since 6pm parking is empty

name: Kuchina Domowa
description: This place has shower and free WiFi, + a coffee shop. You have to pay $3 for the shower though (or purchase something at the shop?)

name: Stare Jablonki
description: Private campsite. We were invited to a typical Polish dinner. You can rent canoe here. Friendly people. They speak German

name: Park 45
description: A campsite under trees directly at the beach about 2 km from the main boulevard of Sopot. The stuff is friendly and helpful.

name: Nice tiny pension (family run)
description:
Cheapest place I could find and still very nice! 
Little house with kitchen, bathroom, small living room and two little beds in sleeping room. 
Payed 50 zloty per night (without booking fee). 

Very simple, very clean. Hot water. Only electrical heaters at wintertime. Run by very nice polish couple. They speak polish and some german. 

Adress:
Zacisze Osławy Agroturystyka, Wysoczany 5, 38-542 Wysoczany, Polen

name: Lakeside
description: Lovely spot at a lake., under trees There are some permanent campers. Very serene early in the morning. Road to the spot is nice as well. Apparently every couple of days the owner comes and wants some money for staying. If you stay for a night you should be fine, otherwise it’s 5€ (so we’ve been told).

name: Odra River
description: a place close to the river for a tent or a motorhome a lot of anglers no access to drinking water

name: Rewahl
description: Wild parking space close to the seafront

name: Ridenow.pl
description: Biker shop and workshop, also assistance with campers and 4x4. English speaking :)

name: Agro na Wapniarni
description: Really lovely hotel/hostel with big private rooms and shared bathroom and common areas. There is a little kitchen with Kettle, toaster, microwave, plates, cutlery etc. Wifi is excellent and we highly recommend getting the home cooked meals, they are big portions and very tasty. It's quite remote but very peaceful and easy access from the main road. Also it's pet friendly, our 2 dogs were in our room and very welcome with no extra charge. You can find the place on Booking.com or just turn up like we did. Would definitely stay again.

name: Zlotow Park city with big forest
description: Big park with big lake and forest around. fish and natural water.

name: Small lake
description: Nice lake 5 min from the A4 highway. There are usually some fishermen here and it’s pretty quiet

name: Zwardoń Myto
description: Parking at the former border terminal.  Shops.  On the other side of the road, the Moya gas station.

name: Moya
description: Moya petrol station, paved parking lot.  On the other side of the road there are shops.

name: Zwardoń
description: Parking in the center of Zwardoń.  Asphalt, sloping.  Near the train station, two shops, a bar.
