name: Na Beskidku (Beskidek)
description: Private parking at the Beskidek Pension.  Possibility to leave the car for a few days when you want to go hiking in the mountains.  Restaurant, guest rooms.  Toilet in the restaurant.

name: Chatka Skalanka
description:
Chatka Skalanka. Student hostel in an old wooden hut. Full access to the kitchen (bring your own food products), toilets, shower. A place for a bonfire. Open on weekends and holidays, at other times by arrangement.
....
Chatka Skalanka. Schronisko studenckie w starej drewnianej chacie. Pełny dostęp do kuchni (własne produkty spożywcze), toalety, prysznic. Miejsce na ognisko. Czynne w weekendy oraz wakacje, w innym terminie po uzgodnieniu.

name: Auto Manix
description: Car repair. Owner speaks very good German and some English. He loves watching overlander‘s videos on YouTube (mostly motorbike travelers), so he knows your needs. He and his son ride BMW and have contacts in town if you need a motorbike repair shop or parts.

name: Speed Queen
description:
Speed Queen Laundromat. 8kg or 14kg available, dryers also.
Bring your own washing powder, it’s NOT included and 5 Zloty extra. 
8kg cost 20 Zloty. There is strong and fast WiFi.
Payed parking in front of the door.

name: BP petrol station shower
description: Shower costs 8 Zloty for 7 minutes what is enough for two people. There is a start/stop button and the water is hot. Shower room is clean and heated.

name: Mściwojów Fishing Lake
description: Calm lake where a lot of locals come to fish, possible to use water for dishes/cleaning but no swimming/drinking. No problems driving here with motorcycle/car/van

name: Nice parking
description: Private parking in the NP. Nobody is here between ~6pm to ~8.30am. We spoke to a local person and it was ok to camp with a tent one night. For cars it should be easier - however you might have to pay the parking fee of 30 ZL, if you stay until the parking opens. There is a DIXI toilet and it seems to be a popular hiking area.

name: Lake Camping
description: Beautiful campground at a lake right at the TET. It was very quiet and peaceful - maybe because it was still closed mid of may (it opens officially in june)? However we were lucky to meet the owner and we could stay one night. They charged us 8 ZL p.P., 5 ZL p. motorcycle and 4 ZL p. tent. They have campfires, little playground for kids, toilets, showers (coins for hot water), electricity and a little beach with a pier by the lake. They only took cash, but there's an ATM in town.

name: Rest place with roofed areas
description:
Nice rest with several roofed areas and a fire pit. It's surprisingly even marked as a camping spot on OSM + we asked some workers and they told us, that overnight camping with a tent is completely fine for a night. There's also a river with a pier where canoeing tours take out their boats.
It's was quiet in the night although there is a little road nearby. Perfect place if the weather is a bit rainy.

name: Lakemania
description: This is a rest and picknic area between two lakes. It has two roofed sitting places, a huge campfire spot, a fountain pump for water and the upper part is flat and grassy - perfect for a tent. There is also a big parking for big cars. We ask a local man and he said camping for a night is ok. Idyllic spot that also provides some rain shelter.

name: Large parking in a forest
description: This is a parking with a shelter structure.

name: Via Toll Distribution
description:
If you’re in need of a Via Toll Box (Trucks and Campers over 3.5 t) for Poland, you can get it here.
Large parking lot for trucks, but getting the box takes some time.
Opening hours
Monday - Saturday 8 am to 8 pm

name: river view
description:
small place with river and forest view.
quiet place.

name: green hydrant
description:
green hydrant with good aqua drinking.
locals people come here too

name: Goczalkowice lake, Wisla Wielka village
description:
Nice place, meadow at the lake. It's possible to stay overnight. Access to the water, but swimming is not allowed. Far from buildings, 500m from the 939 road. Super view on the lake and mountains. Access by the unpaved road, really bumpy, not suitable for low suspended cars, campers.
Rather for bikers, motorbikes, backpackers.

name: watchtower in Dosłońce village
description: sightseeing tower and rest area  with roof, tables and benches. Great view

name: Rycerka Górna Kolonia
description: Free basic camp ground prepared by National Forest. Nice wooden shelter, fireplace, access to the river, some tables and benches. Pawed, narrow road. Accessible by cars and midsize campers.

name: Posmyk
description: nice beach at the lake next to the some recreation camps. Possible to stay overnight  in tent or camper. Last 300m unpaved but accessible. quiet, fine view.

name: Dabrowa Lubolska
description: Wild camp site at Jeziorsko lake. Based on lake bank earth rampart. Accessible for bikers, motorbikes. super views, quiet. Access road unpaved.

name: Pilich
description: Nice rest area with shelter, tables and benches. Access to the lake. Spot for tents. Accessible by unpawed road suitable for bikers, adv motorbikes or high suspended cars.

name: mieduniszki wielkie
description: very nice wild camping place near to almost abandoned village. Beautiful rivers crossing and bridge. Quiet, access to the river. Road bumpy but accessible.

name: Dębowo Lock
description: Beautiful place at the Dębowo Lock, near Augustowski Channel and Biebrza river crossings. Quiet and nice spot for tent or even camper. Easy access to the water. Any mosquito spray is a must !

name: camping spot at Gnojno Ferry
description: Big and nice camp spot at the river Bug bank, with some shelters, tables and benches. Gravel access road. Fireplace.

name: Wild camp Nowy Staw
description: Nice rest area with shelter. Wild camp ground with access to the small pond. quiet, access  by unpaved road.

name: Przewóz, old ferry station
description: Nice rest area and wild campsite at the Odra river bank. Spot with some tables and benches under the roof. Fireplace and  access to the water(river). Quiet, some distance from nearest buildings.

name: wild campsite at the crossroads
description:
Wild campsite, rest area on the pawed trail from Krzywa to Bartne. 
access for cars, campers, bikers.
water from the well, fireplace, some wood available.

name: Spot at the Martwa Wsla bank
description: Big area, quiet, very beutiful but no services, free. Sandy road and ground so be careful. Just drive straight to the ferry and turn right after KEJA restaurant. Follow sandy road possible for smaller RV's, tent, hammock.

name: Potable water next to a crossing
description: Potable water, look for a blue hydrant with a sticker of a glass with water.

name: Kosobudz
description: Nice and cosy campground by the lake (clean water!!!) Seems popular over the weekends. To check in you need to call the owners.

name: JZ Guest Ranch Campsite
description:
MODERATOR NOTE: Description provided by owner or manager.  

A quiet place for nature lovers.
Horseback riding, bicycles and a fishing boat are available on site.  Willing people can buy their own eggs, milk, cottage cheese and many other goods from our garden and orchard.
There are many attractive lakes, forests and rivers in the area.
The houses contain 2 double bedrooms, a living room with a kitchenette and a bathroom.
Each of the houses can accommodate 4 people and, when unfolding the corner sofa in the living room, additional 2 people.
Each room is heated and air-conditioned.

name: Informal campground at the river
description: Take the first left after the (blue)bridge coming from the south, then again left dirtroad. At the river you can go r or l. Space enough. Seems to be a weekend hangout for locals. Many spot under trees. Nobody here (wednesday) Nice graffitty on bridge foundations!

name: Zalew Słup
description: Clean water.  plenty of space for a tent for free.  a lot of garbage, unfortunately.  I hope it will change someday.

name: Jezioro Klimkowskie
description: Free camping with no facilities, a lot of space for many RVs and rigs

name: willa nad sola , Przecna 2 Osimwicke/auswichtz
description: guest house available , 1 cabin outside the house ( 140 pln / night ) , 3 tent outside the house ( 100 pln / night incl tent matras , sleeping bag and power ) in house 3 room with 1 big bed , or 3 small bed , very clean kitchen , very clean toilet and shower , parking free secure inside the yard , friendly owner ( ladys ) big supermarket 5 minute walk , 3 km from austwich concentration camp... they have tent , no need our tent

name: Beautiful place to camp
description: It’s a perfect place to spend a couple days in the nature

name: Restplace in the fields
description: Parking and place for rest next to the road. Surrounded by fields and hills. There is shed with benches, tables and grill and open fireplace next to the shed.

name: Mineral water sping
description: Mineral water spring. Great taste if you like such things. Healthy as hell. :p

name: Pickingplace next to the road
description: Great pickingplace next to the road. Big shed, open to public with tables, benches, 2 fire places and one grill. Parking for a few cars. River near by. There was even free wood for fire prepared.

name: Pickingplace by the lake
description: Very nice and quiet place, far enough from main road. Big shed, benches, tables, fireplaces. There is a small lake where anglers do their fishy things. About  1.2 km further in the woods you can find biggest fir in Poland (Lasumiła) - worth to see.

name: Dolina baryczy Lake Trails
description: dolina baryczy has an app for the trails.  Our VW van is front wheel only and we arrive very easily around the lakes. During the day it has moderate bike traffic. This spot is right on the lake. good fishing. great for birders.  we slept in the van

name: suwalki free wild camp
description: Good place with fireplace, grill, watchtower, shelters and swimming place, but you can't swim here. This place is monitored by cameras.

name: Forest track
description: We can to find the Berries Forest wild camp and found this turnoff just before it which had a track leading into the forest that was not as grooved (easier to drive in and be hidden from the road). Seems to be a mountain biking trail. Nice and shady on a hot day. Might be hard for an RV to turn around but there is room to park one at the start of the dirt turnoff from the road. We came down a further track on motorcycles.

name: Beautiful meadow with view
description:
A beautiful meadow with spectacular view of the Izera Mountains. The place is hidden from the main road and houses. However, it's close to the small, sleepy village center. No long and difficult access requiring 4x4. No passers-by, only friendly shepards nearby. The place is owned by a very nice couple, who come in the evening to have a brief chat and collect money for the stay. we paid 35 pln (around 7 euros) for our Land Cruiser with the 
roof tent (2 people) but I guess the price is fixed no matter what type of car you come by. Internet reception is v. good, very close to the single tracks in Swieradow-Zdroj and further mountain exploration.

name: Pensjonat u Missiow
description: Single room for PLN80 from Booking.com. Fast wifi. Motorbike can park inside the garden. Cars park on the street.

name: Eagle Camping at Lake
description: Small Camp directly at a Lake. Very simple. Nice people. 25 € per night for one Vehicle with 5 persons, 1 tent, 2 dogs.

name: Kamping Rutka-Tartak
description: Free village campground on a small lake.  5 spots along a fence in a gravel lot and there are tent spots in the grass.  There are two power points along the fence for 4 RVs.  Great free unlocked town wifi, 4G cell signal too. One building has bathrooms but no showers.  There is access to fresh water.

name: Bosch
description:
The mechanic, Dariusz, speaks English.  He was skilled and provided good advice at a reasonable price.  Fixed an electrical problem and an AC issue.
tel: 578-103-86-54
dab.bosch.service.pl

name: water source
description: Potable water for free, no hose at place

name: Wioslarstwo
description: Large brick fenced in parking area of the sailing and rowing club.  30 zlotys to park, 20 zlotys for a shower and 20 more for power.  Fresh water hose available at corner of the building on left when you are facing the building.  4G signal.

name: Park parking lots
description: There are two parking areas here.  Don't be discouraged by the size of the road in; it will take you there.  There is a free toilet in the first lot and some rubbish bins.  4G signal.  Quiet especially in the larger second dirt lot beyond the first lot.  Not much is around but they are shops within 1.5 km.  There is a tramline nearby not but sure where it goes. You can take walks in the park like the locals do.

name: MOP rest area
description: Large highway rest area with lots of parking.  Could probably spend the night but we just used the dumping (grey and cassette) and got fresh water.  A bathroom is available and there was a locked shower in the handicap one.  no idea what to get key though as there's no office or gas station.

name: Gmina Lutowiska
description:
Nice parking place with beautiful view. During the day many locals (they come, make photos and then they leave.
Good for a night!

name: Bieszczadzki National Park
description:
Lovely, silent spot, direktly near a smal river. You park between the trees on green gras. Some locals are also here. We stayed there for 3 days. 
Nice place to go for hiking tours.

name: Holy sanctuary
description:
Good place to stay for one or two nights. Very quite. Showers and toilets. Water also.
We paid 20 Zloty for one night directly next to the holy sanctuary.

name: Lake Zalew Jagodno
description: Wonderful lake where to camp under the trees. Nice sunset and warm water (in summer time) to take a bath.

name: Street parking
description:
On street parking opposite a parking lot. Short walk from the city center and old town. Only the last parking spot is level enough for camping.

Portaloos in the parking lot opposite

name: Baza Motocyklowa Malesowizna
description: Awesome motorcycle camp run by very friendly owners. Lovely spot. Camping 30zl, bed in hostel type building 45zl. Home made meals available. Cars are welcomed too.

name: Latarnik Camping
description:
Small Campsite, close to the water.
Secure parking and overnight place. 
Picnic tables, electricity, shower and toilet available.
We paid PLN 30 for two people and one night.

name: beautiful spot at Bug river
description: Great possibilities for wildcamping at Bug river. The coordinates are of the first possible spot, but there are many other spots as well along the river. Just follow the small dirt road and you will see different options on your right side (see pics 3 and 4). When wet, probably only 4x4, because of the soft grassy underground. Some very friendly fishermen come by during the day and beginning of the evening, nights totally alone and quiet, at least at week days in September. There are also cows grazing in this area, so if the fence near the dyke is closed please close it again after you enter so the cows don't walk away .

name: Between Bystra and Lubczyna
description: quiet road with plenty of wild camping spots. Stayed on a wide open field with beautiful view. Very quiet at night, no busy road.

name: Stasiana Camp Ground
description: Official, free camping site, next to the road - some huts, fireplaces, a lot of flat space to camp, available for campers, cars, etc. There are trash bins, WC, but no running water. It is possible to boil a fresh stream water (note - not the big one, there happen to be also small streams but they might be weather dependent)

name: Parking near open-air museum
description: Parking near open-air museum od city Sanok and San River. It's free, crowded during the opening hour of museum but quiet at night. No facalities, big enough for big rig, a lot of space for many campers. there are toilets, fancy bakery and nice regional shops inside museum, entrance is free on entrance monday (9-12am).

name: Park Generala Sikorskiego
description: Dead end street next to the park. Few laybyes allow for overnight stay

name: Parking Single Track Gozdno
description: Quite big parking spot in a quiet place on the edge of a wood. Single tracks for bicycles available around. Good for maybe one overnight stay.

name: Highway stop
description: Nice clean semi warm showers . We were surprised and very thankful after a long day on the road

name: Large forest shelter with BBQ in the middle
description: I was there during the winter and it was completely empty. very sweet place. watch out, there are a couple roads to get there, and there's one that isn't referenced from the main road made out of packed dirt. look for a satellite view and you'll spot it. So 4x4 is not required. There are no signs and a house nearby. There's a fireplace in the middle. Very close to the wolf's lair. Probably sees more activity during the summer

name: Camping Marina
description:
the camp site is situated at a nice sea with fishing area. No limitation for big RV. Water , electric power , shower, toilets and kids playground. Kitchen for tent camper and a Restaurant. BBQ, sauna and party tent at the shore.
Good place for bikers.

name: Wakacyjna Wioska NGÔ
description:
A lovely site near a huge family pool Suntago. The camp site is managed by a friendly couple, they run apartments and a good restaurant with asien food. Pool, playground, BBQ etc. 
Bus connection to Warsaw.

name: Biwak
description: Parking place at the start of a small hike with access to a swimming lake. The ground is large enough for several cars/campers. Picknick tables and toilet. It's only accessible by a dirt road, signs are there.

name: Leśna Chata Kowalówka
description:
MODERATOR NOTE: Description provided by owner or manager of property.

Leśna Chata is located on the edge of the picturesque town of Cieszanów, situated in the valley of the Brusienka River, which begins at the edge of Roztocze Południowe.

We have prepared over 20 beds in 4 and 2-bed rooms for our guests.  All rooms have a separate bathroom with a shower and its own toiletries.  Each room has comfortable beds, a TV and free WiFi.  To meet the expectations of guests, it is possible to book rooms with meals.
 On site, guests can use the swimming pool, volleyball court, light a bonfire or use the grill, as well as catch a fish in our pond.  Also in the area you will find interesting attractions: tennis courts, year-round ice rink, skate park, swimming pool, numerous bicycle paths.

name: Jezioro Skrzyneckie
description: Beach on the southern shore of the lake, next to a small bar.  Place for several motorhomes.  Easy access to the water.

name: The beach by the island
description: Beach by the lake, 50 meters from the road.  Comfortable descent to the water, a place to light a fire.  Access via a narrow forest road, rather for 4x4.  Space for several cars.

name: Quite place near łąkę
description: Beautiful, quite place for short parking And overnight

name: Pole Namiotowe
description: Lovely small campsite in the center of the town. it is in the garden of the owners house. small kitchen and good showers and toilets. great parking for motorcycles. 35 zloty 1 person in a tent. cash only. a very lovely place to stay

name: Wawrowski Caravan Park
description: Really nice campsite on the edge of town. Small and friendly, takes tents too not just campervans. facilities are in the house basement. lovely hosts very welcoming.

name: miejsce nad jeziorem
description: very nice and calm place at the lake, just for tent

name: Pokoje Noclegi Orzech
description: I was very lucky to have found this place at booking.com. The place has all you need, is very comfy and very affordable. But most of all, Gregor, the owner, is a Motorbike Enduro Rider and knows all the good local spots for Offroad riding. He took me around for one day and it was amazing!! He also let me park my bike in his Garage. I strongly recommend this place for motorbike travelers!

name: Libajno Lake (free)
description: free camping spot for 2 small campers, toilets, warm water, free electricity, no showers, great view, tables under the roof. excellent place to stay. It's EU project so it's for free

name: Bivouac Sokole Góry
description: Free camping field in the forest managed by a forester. Tables and benches and place for a bonfire. Without water and toilets. Access by forest road.

name: Plaża nad jeziorem
description: Beach on a small lake with the possibility of setting up a tent or motorhome. In the off-season, peace and few people

name: be careful no boat here
description:
June 01, 2023 no boat here.  you have to go 15km further east.
Maybe in high season it works, we don't know.

name: Barge crossing for pedestrian, bicycle and car
description:
Crossing open monday->Friday from 10h to 18h and saturday and sunday from 8h to 18h.
Pedestrian = 4 NLP
Cyclists = 5 NLP
Cars = 12 PNL

name: Stawy wędkarskie Kudowa-Zdrój
description: Fishing ponds, 100 meters from the main road in Kudowa-Zdrój. Usually calm for one night. Perfect.

name: Parking Area
description:
Large parking area. Busy, a lot of people come here to relax.
There is a lot to do.
Wake boarding, swimming, fitness equipment.
Restaurant / fastfood.
Busy, busy. Quiet at night.

name: DomNaPlecach
description: A pebble beach by the river. Access to the beach itself is hard for large campers, but there are a lot of cool places along the river, so you can always find a place to cool off.

name: Spichlerz Camping
description: What a wonderful cheap camping ground. Toilets are very clean. Everything is flat and nice area.

name: castle Krzytopor
description:
Grasfield with a view over Castle Krzutopor.

Great sunset over the fields.
Great moon view at night over the castle.
In front of the field a small lake for fishing.

peacefull.
in the evenig some youth come there with there car, no problems everything cool.
at night quit.

7 minutes walk to the Castle.

name: parking behind church
description: Large peaceful parking. 250 meters from the supermarket. Near a small kebab shop. Very quiet at night. Away from the busy road.

name: Feel Free Farm
description:
Very nice farm / horse ranch where you can camp (both tent and camper van). Run by a very friendly Belgian couple. Clean & hot showers, WiFi, lots of horses around. Large grassy camp spot with trees for shade.
15 € for 2 persons in a tent + 1€ each for the shower.

name: Lu Apartments
description:
Value Airbnb listed as Lu Apartments on the site. Very clean, studio apartment with kitchen - I paid €40/night. Secure parking for bikes and other vehicles. Close to food and local shops. Perfect place if staying in area.
Remote checkin via booking on Airbnb site. There are no attendants for checkin.

name: Forest camping | Natura 2000 | Bench & Table
description: Nice spot with bench & table, surrounded by forest in which you can camp for a night. Perfect for cyclists. No facilities.

name: Kluczwoda Camping
description: Nice little camping spot close to Krakow. It’s situation right by a stream and a local nature park that has hiking. Very nice hosts, would recommend! $13/ person per night

name: Wrocław Camp
description: Camping 100m away from main road In the garden of a villa.  Grassy numbered pitches some have tree shade.  Some with power outlets.  Ablutions clean. 26€ for a car with rooftop tent. 6€ for power.

name: Narew wild camp
description: A quiet place near the river with the opportunity to put up a tent and make a fire. It is also possible to go fishing.

name: Parking Area
description: Wild parking under the mountain Great Owl. You can spend the night in a camper on the top of the mountain. place for a bonfire.

name: Pole Namiotowe Piaseczno
description:
A quiet corner of the tent field further from the main field, with fewer tents. To the bar and reception of the field you have to walk a few dozen meters. Of the infrastructure in this part, only TOYTOY is available. At the reception area, there are more facilities, along with a bar serving food and drinks.
.....
Spokojny zakątek pola namiot dalej od głównego pola, z mniejszą liczbą namiotów. Do baru i recepcji pola trzeba przejść kilkadziesiąt metrów. Z infrastruktury w tej części dostępny jedynie TOYTOY. Przy recepcji więcej udogodnień, wraz z barem serwującym posiłki i napoje.

name: Farm Stay
description:
Clean budget accommodations. From the main road there is a sign for ‘4C’. Available for walk-in.
Secure gated parking for motorcycle or vehicles. I paid $33USD/night.

name: Backwaters on the Oder River
description: A long strip of open area near the river is a lot of space and several roads can be reached. Large motorhomes can have a problem. After the rain, you also have to be careful. For a tent a great place to stay. A lot of anglers.

name: Place and Lake Olejnickie
description: A few places to stay by the lake. You can pitch a tent, light a bonfire, fish if you have a fishing card. Sometimes you can sauce anglers. Not a good place for swimming

name: Osłonin Plaża
description: Free parking for cars and motorhomes right on the beach in Osłonino. Possibility of pitching a tent. Shop in the area. Pig walking next to the parking lot, sometimes there are a lot of flies and unpleasant odors.Overall nice place, but not perfect.

name: Masłońskie beach
description: Beach by the Porajski reservoir lake.  Places for campers and tents.  Grocery store nearby.

name: Campsite near lake
description: A fairly quiet campsite just outside the city of Poznan. Some fisherman where there, but they didn't bother us. There's also a fireplace, so maybe it is busier in warmer months.

name: Meditation place
description: A dirt road along the forest where you can park your car and motorhome for the night. It is not an official car park. It's not an official camping site, just a nice vantage point. It is better not to light bonfires because it is too close to the forest and it is illegal outside designated places in Poland.

name: Hunter’s hut
description: Beautiful spot in the middle of the forest. There is a good road to a hunter’s hut, drive a bit further for an open spot. Perfect for a tent or small camper van.

name: Źródełko Maryi
description: Small parking 100 meters from the spring with clean drinking water. Access by dirt road. Water flows all year round, but if there is rain or snow, it can be a problem with access. The source is located in the forest by the chapel.

name: Staw Złotno
description: A small fishing pond near the national park. A quiet place, sometimes people do not take their garbage. There is a lot of seaweed in the pond. Swimming is not safe. You can light a bonfire and set up a tent. Free public place.

name: MK moto
description:
Motorcycle machanic and workshop.
These guys are great. Took my honda CT 110 for a service, brakes etc and they fixed everything that was wrong with it. now it goes like a rocket and corners like a pro. Really happy best job anyone has done on my bike. 

 address Warecka 34, 05-530 Czersk, Poland

name: Rezerwat20
description: restored old school on a very clean lake. 3 large over 60 square meters apartments with mezzanines. each apartment can comfortably accommodate up to 6 people. There is a very large garden, hammocks, a fireplace, a shed with a kitchen, tables. Peace and quiet. Pet friendly

name: Parking under the magic hill
description: Small parking under the hill. Close to a little frequented road. Peace and quiet, a place for a bonfire. 100 meters below a larger parking lot. 50 meters above drinking spring water

name: Źródełko pod Czarodziejską Górką
description: Clean spring water. A lot of local people take water here

name: Kamyki
description: Parking and a place for a tent and fireplace. A lot of anglers, a nice place to walk and spend time by the water. Access only from the main street in street "dworcowa" and then the street "na kamienołom" to the end. Google Maps sometimes badly guided to this place.

name: Siedlisko Pod Dębami
description: Camping/Glamping/Cabins/ Apartment in SĘPOPOL, near Green Velo cycle route.

name: Marina Jachtowa Świnoujście
description: Campground at Yacht Marina of Świnoujście - clean toilets & showers - free choice of parking spot - 5 min walking distance into city centre - 20 min walk to the beach - very quiet at night

name: Pole namiotowe CYPEL PIENINY
description: big campsite along a beautiful river. lots of space for cars and tents and everything bigger or smaller. for tent and moto was 8 Euro. shower is 5 zloty and lots of food places nearby

name: Camping Pod Skamieniałym Miastem
description: small campsite with sanitary facilities, a tennis court, a sports ground, a basketball court.  There are also chalets for rent and a bar.  The campsite is nevertheless noisy because in the evening people party and talk loudly until 3am.  No one monitors or enforces silence at night.

name: Łazy
description: Free parking spots at a death-end-road in Łazy - restaurants & shops around - free toilets along the road - 50m to the beach - at daytime folks passing by on way to the beach - very quiet at night

name: Parking Ustka
description: Huge gravel parking free of charge - 5 min walking into city center - 10 min to the beach - locals park their cars here as well - pit toilet free to use - very quiet at night

name: BP Gas Station Celbowo
description:
Sanitation dump station and water tap
Dumping for free - water 1Zl/10l

name: Kemping pod Kijowem
description: Awesome place with small fishpond. Quiet location. Animal friendly. Toilets and showers.  Follow small signs camping!!!

name: Auto Serwis Pasek Lakiernictwo Mechanika
description: cheap and friendly. just the road under the sanctuary parking place.. good contact. take Time to visit the sanctuary

name: camping
description:
very basic Campsite
one toilet building
no shower
swim in lake
small shop open till 20:00 with chips etc... and beer 
no wifi

name: Agro Camper Park
description: Little campground, friendly owner speaks English, hot showers, clean toilets. I paid 40 Zloty for 1 person + car + rooftop tent.

name: Marina Szczecin
description:
Huge & free parking lot at the Szczecin Marina - 
busy at daytime until 11 pm due to Holiday Park & Wheel of Szczecin right next to the parking - very quiet at night - 10 min walking to city centre

name: Camper park
description: Free parking for motorhomes close to the gold mine and supermarket. Access to water and electricity paid, but a discharge of toilet and gray water for free.

name: Zalew Paczkowski
description: Free place with a nice view. In the season a lot of campers and anglers. Access by dirt road

name: Camper Park plaza gminna
description: very nice and clean and calm at the lake. Grill places and seats and table available

name: Forest parking place
description: Official forest parking with camping infrastructure. There is shelter with sitting areas and a fire place. Mobile toilets are also available

name: Wild Parking
description: Firepit , lake , forest , place for a tent and several campers

name: Wroclaw
description: Few free parking places next to a park and close to the city center. Toilet and drinking water nearby.

name: Sheltered picnic table
description:
Picnic table with a roof. good for having a lunch break or a quick shelter when raining. unfortunately lots of garbage. 

max 8hrs of parking. garbage can present.

name: Waterfall
description: Waterfall near the Złotno pond. It seems to be clean water, but it is better to drink after boiling. Access only on foot in the forest 50 meters from the dirt road.

name: Punkt czerpania wody
description: It's a local emergency water intake. There's a tiny beach and a lot of room for a caravan, tent or just sleeping under a tarp. Bins are provided, there's a chemical clean toilet and non-potable water from a well. The place is run by National Forests and the people who take charges for the stay come by one/twice a week. Not marked on Google Maps at the moment therefore known to the locals

name: Wioska Walachia Glamila
description:
Very beautiful campsite that rents out safari tents on a small hillside at a very clean lake. The campsite offers also space for campers/overlanders. There is water and electricity. Not sure if there is a dump station. Also a very nice pool, playground, kayaking and fishing possibilities. Child friendly and nice staff. By the swimming pool is a coffee/bar unit. Fireplaces, wood and bbq available. 

To reach the campsite use the road coming from the village. Google maps will guide you from the other direction, but this is not possible!
You need to go true a small tunnel. But our truck is 395cm high and fits with some space over.

name: Źródło Mąkolnicy
description: Pure spring water close to the road and with space for a car. I would suggest to be sure to filter the water or boil it because the source of this water is 100 meters higher.

name: Nad Gniewoszowem
description: Viewpoint with the possibility of spending the night in the wild. There is nothing else here. Several places for a bonfire

name: View from Michelenki Cliff
description: viewpoint over the sea from the top of a cliff, a little bt further is a staircase to the beach

name: Przystań Siewierz
description: Small campsite near Przeczyce lake, small sanitary facilities, bar. You can eat or drink something on location, canoes can be rented, sauna available. Gravel access road.

name: Wielka Sowa Panorama
description: Beautiful spot next to a dirt road with amazing panorama, especially for sunrise

name: Brest-Terespol border crossing
description:
Border crossing between Poland and Belarus.

We crossed from Poland to Belarus. The polish side was really quick and easy. Just a document check of the passport and car registration and a quick look inside all doors. Took about 5 minutes.

On the Belarus side you first have to buy car insurance before going to the immigration. We had to wait for a bit as our passport and visa were checked very thoroughly. We were further asked about our travel plans in Belarus and our past destinations especially Ukraine. 

Afterwards you go to the Belarus customs. We had to go to the red channel for our car. You first have to wait until your license plate will appear on a screen next to your assigned customs booth. Once there you have to fill out 2 copies of the vehicle declaration. As I don’t speak Russian the customs lady helped me fill it out. Then you have to empty your car and put all your things on a desk next to the car. They will check everything and they brought a dog to go around our car. Then you can put your stuff back in the car and have to wait until the lady brings your passport and vehicle registration with the completed customs declaration and you’re free to enter Belarus. 

PS: Dont use this crossing when going from Belarus to Poland. The line to enter Poland was very long and seemingly didn’t move at all during the 3 hours we needed to cross the border.

name: Półwysep Leśnych Harców
description: In a pine forest in front of the lake, convenient because it is close to the town.

name: in front of the river
description: A quiet place in front of the river.  To get there there is a clean dirt road, no campers, yes camperVans

name: Camping/hotel Dobczyce
description: Nice campsite at a hotel. The people are very friendly. There is a basic toilet and shower, but clean. There is electricity and water. No dump station. There is a playground, swimming pool and fire pit. Also a nice restaurant with food/sushi/ice and cold beer. Big rig friendly as we travel with a Expedition Truck (long 9m x3,90 heigh). Cost was 100pln per night (truck, 2 adults and 2 kids).  They speak Polish, English and German

name: Wyderka Campsite
description: Quiet campsite near lake. Lot of trees giving shadow in sunny days. Pet friendly. Shop about 4km far away.

name: Paved spot in forest
description: A small paved spot in the forest. There's a rail depot nearby with freight trains passing during the night.

name: Area busy with fishermen in front of the lake
description: busy area with fishermen in front of the lake, there is a supermarket nearby.  You can light a fire

name: Czarny Trakt
description: Free camping site with the possibility of lighting a bonfire. Small parking with sloping terrain. Possibility of pitching a tent but little space with flat terrain.

name: Pole Biwakowe Sadówka
description: Very nice meadow place in a rural atmosphere with friendly owners (you even get a gift when you check in, let yourself be surprised). Events like oldtimer- or traveller-meetings are also possible. Very relaxed. Electricity you can also get if you need. Highway is nearby, audible, but also overheard. 60 Zloty or 14 Euro.

name: Szlak Wrzosowo - Żółcino
description: Great place for camping. S mall beach with access to the water. Very busy during the day. Good for a one day stopover.

name: Rogowo
description: Great campsite for four-wheel drive vehicles. You can quickly get to the beach via the dune. Internet access is limited.

name: Wild camping
description: Really nice large flat place around the forest for wildcamping

name: Lorf hostel & coffee
description: It’s okay hostel with safe parking in the yard for the motorbike . 7€ euros for the room and 2 euros for the bike !  For one night it’s super

name: Lakeside
description: Parkingplace behind a small swimming facility.During the day some people are swimming here.Over night very quiet.

name: Solter 4x4
description: 4x4 car service,  mainly Toyota, "Solter 4x4"

name: Solter 4x4, car service
description: Solter 4x4, car service, mainly Toyota. Here you can repair your 4x4 car

name: Rayo 4x4, car service
description: Rayo 4x4, car service, mainly Land Rover, Toyota. Here you can repair you 4x4 car. Conversion into an overlander. Offroad parts.

name: Small fishing pond
description: Tiny fishing pond, no no oveenight signs, clean and quiet.

name: Mozzarella Pizzeria
description: Great stop for high quality pizza, nice seating space next to the park. Very popular, at times full during peak hours.
